data.name: Arksync
data.detailed_description:
Take control of a war robot reprogrammed by a small toy bear who rides on your shoulder. Explore the branching paths of the Arksync facility, each leading to uniquely designed levels, enemies, and boss fights built to hurt your feelings. Each run through the facility allots a small amount of lives, buy more or be rebuilt in the safe house where you can feel sad about all the resources you just lost. Upgrade your robotic rig, and modify your weapons insuring a safe journey. There's many unique weapons to find, and powerful utilities like explosives, auto gun turrets, and the multi targeting missile salvo to name a few. Find them in the world, or purchase them in the facility's Depot in between levels.



Yes we know what it's like to share a game with others, and we've made sure you can even continue your Rig and weapon progress through local co-op using the game's user profile system. Store or retrieve items from the Resource Locker that connects between any playthrough.



Do we think you'll survive, probably not, but at least you can blow up some expensive stuff along the way.
data.about_the_game:
Take control of a war robot reprogrammed by a small toy bear who rides on your shoulder. Explore the branching paths of the Arksync facility, each leading to uniquely designed levels, enemies, and boss fights built to hurt your feelings. Each run through the facility allots a small amount of lives, buy more or be rebuilt in the safe house where you can feel sad about all the resources you just lost. Upgrade your robotic rig, and modify your weapons insuring a safe journey. There's many unique weapons to find, and powerful utilities like explosives, auto gun turrets, and the multi targeting missile salvo to name a few. Find them in the world, or purchase them in the facility's Depot in between levels.



Yes we know what it's like to share a game with others, and we've made sure you can even continue your Rig and weapon progress through local co-op using the game's user profile system. Store or retrieve items from the Resource Locker that connects between any playthrough.

data.short_description: Wired from the ashes of twin stick Shooters, Arksync evolves the genre with breakneck player movement and combat. Survive and buy weapons, utilities, and upgrades; then risk it all as you enter the depths of the evacuation facility. It's the only way to take this robot teddy bear home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3GHz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB ATI Radeon HD 7970, 2GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB AMD 5750, Nvidia 650M, 1.5GB Intel Iris Pro 6200, or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04.2 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 series
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 960 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Recommended

content_descriptors.notes: Contains cartoon violence and gore, and profanity
